articles.title: Australia duo battling fitness concerns ahead of T20 World Cup - ICC Cricket
articles.description: A pair of Australia's most experienced players have picked up injuries at the ongoing edition of the IPL, less than two months out from their opening fixture at the T20 World Cup.
articles.content: Marsh is expected to be named as Australia's full-time captain in the shortest format prior to the T20 World Cup, with coach Andrew McDonald indicating last month the hard-hitting No.3 was an obvious… [+436 chars]
